entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
